ARABIC: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْهِم مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ لَمُبْلِسِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: even though before He sent it down on them they were in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Although before it came down they were despondent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: although before that they were given to despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: at the rainfall, though before that they had been in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Although they had lost hope before it was sent down upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, before that -- just before it was sent down upon them -- they were in despair!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Though they were before this, before it was sent down upon them, confounded in sure despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: although before it was sent down on them before that they had been in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Though before that, even before it was sent down upon them, they were in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: though before that, before it was sent down upon them, they were in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Even though before it was sent down upon them, before that, they were surely despairing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed they had been despondent earlier, before it was sent down upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Even though, before they received (the rain) - just before this - they were dumb with despair!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily before that (rain), just before it was sent down upon them, they were in despair!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: though before its coming they had despaired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Although they were before this—before it was sent down upon them—in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Although they were, before it was sent down upon them - before that, in despair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:49] Though indeed before it was sent down upon them, before that (min qablihi is [repeated] for emphasis) they had been despondent, despairing of its sending down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Though before that) before the rain, (even before it was sent down upon them, they were in despair) about the rain.
